post.author: Admin
post.title: 2014-2015 Band and Band Front Registrations Due
post.description: The Band registrations for next year were due by March 24 (except for Band Front) and while most hav
post.content:
The Band registrations for next year were due by March 24 (except for Band Front) and while most have successfully submitted their online Registrations, we still have a number of missing registrations, measurement, and volunteer forms that are now late. Please submit the forms as soon as you can. We require the following 3 forms to be filled out and submitted for every band student:

  1. Band Registration (use credit card or paypal)
  2. Measurement Forms (for uniforms)
  3. Volunteer Form

Note: If your student will be a Royalaire or Royalette and does NOT play an instrument during concert season, use the Band Front Registration form, which is now available.
